title: Forced to quit game.
body:
I got my new MacBook Pro 2016 a few days ago, and I found I can not really play lol on my computer. My game was often forced to quit, especially happened on champion selection. I tried everything I could do, redownload game, update my system. Really need help. 
T.T

This is what it showed after I got forced quit game. PIZZZZZZ Help me !
I'd recommend you restart your mac and try again. If you experience an error again, can you [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of any you see and send me the link?

https://twitter.com/composerbaize/status/807298868597653505

I post that picture on my twitter.  Hope you can see it

Gotcha, thanks for providing the screenshot. This is a general application error on macOS, which is why your original copy/pasta confused me. Since this error pops up in champ select the most, I suspect this is caused by an unstable connection to our servers. The most probable cause is one or more network settings that conflict with League. Luckily, our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most common misconfigurations and how to resolve them, so I suggest giving those steps a go.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues.

Since you're still seeing issues, I'd like to escalate this to our tech specialists from here out. I'd recommend using our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some system logs before attaching them to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you have any questions, let me know.

Hi Blade, I have been reading through this thread and I am having the same issue. For a few days now, my game will freeze up in the champ select screen, making me miss my ban/pick and forcing me to dodge. The few times I can make it into a game, the game is moved up into the top right quadrant of my screen so all I see is the lower left of the game. When this occurs, the only way I have found to get out of the game is to manually shutdown and reboot my computer. However, when I do this, I cannot reopen the League client afterward. I have completely uninstalled and reinstalled the game, only to find the issue repeat itself in entirety. I have the exact same error message as LBZ, saying it is a segmentation issue. As of this moment, League will not even open on my Macbook Pro.

What do you suggest?
